name: iPoolLightSwitch
0:
”Alexa, turn on Pool light”
”Alexa, turn off the Pool light”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
With the iPool Light skill and Alexa, you can now interact with your Color Led Pool & Spa Lights, and their colors settings. 
To get started, select the "Enable Skill" button in the Alexa App to link your iPool ColorBriteSwitch™ and say, "Alexa, discover devices”. 
 
Light Controls:
- You can turn devices on/off, for example: “Alexa, turn on my Pool lights” or “Alexa, turn off the Pool lights”.

Color Control:
offers possibilities to change or set Colors and Lightshows.
Say, "Alexa, set the Pool light to Blue"
The Colors Lightshows vary depending on the Brand and model Pool light that you are controlling.
Compatibility:
The ColorBriteSwitch™ works with these lights
Jandy/Zodiac/Fluidra Savi, HydroCool, WaterColor LED Pool & Spa lights
Pentair IntelliBrite®, MicroBrite®, GloBrite Color LED Pool & Spa lights
Hayward Universal ColorLogic® CrystalLogic® LED Pool & Spa lights
SR Smith Treo LED Pool & Spa lights 
J&J Electronics ColorSplash LED Pool & Spa lights
More brands and models are being added and seamlessly made available to all users.
